title: Blank shortcut
body:
**Describe the bug**
I accidentally created a blank shortcut after attempting to add a shortcut with no image using the companion app.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to GlanceThing companion app on MacOS
2. Add a shortcut without an image.

**Expected behavior**
A blank icon should be visible on the CarThing that functions but is not visible in and cannot be removed using the companion app.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: MacOS 15.1
 - GlanceThing version: [v0.0.6-1]
author: phist210

comments.body: ps: shout out Calibre in the README screenshot

Update:
Rebooting and restarting GlanceThing fixed the issue. After this cycle, I could see the blank icons in GlanceThing.
Oh, I probably forgot to check if an image had been set. Will be fixed :)

title: macOS Support for GlanceThing
body:
Adds macOS support for macOS 
----

### Open Apps
When adding shortcuts place the command `open APP_PATH` to open certain apps on macOS

### Caveats 
Lock function is more like a Sleep function on macOS, if you want to use as a lock you need to change on System Settings

`System Settings > Lock Screen > Require Password > Immediatelly`
